english.segment1: Counting down, expecting. Latest, greatest. Newest model maybe, hope. Wishing, hoping, praying. To outdo the Joneses
english.segment2: Squalor, impulse, crowding. Tis the season. Do the days turn just for these?. Savior born in manger. Please forgive us born in the inn
english.segment3: Heaven tomorrow. Heaven, my chance to have it all
english.segment4: See all my glimmering weakness. Here's my world, come on. Will You come in?. Brought to my knees. Child I'll play for You
english.segment5: Child enters in this world. It's broken. Angels sing and men sleep the night. Though it's brazen and defiant. Please be born in my heart
english.segment6: Heaven tomorrow. Heaven, skies open. Pour out hope
english.segment7: See all my glimmering weakness. Here's my world, come on. Will You come in?. Brought to my knees. Child I'll play for You
